subject: Basketball
Stadiums and Arenas
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Because of renovations at their usual home, the Yellow Jackets’ men’s basketball schedule consists of 5 games in the Atlanta suburbs and 10 at Philips Arena in the city center.
snippet: Because of renovations at their usual home, the Yellow Jackets’ men’s basketball schedule consists of 5 games in the Atlanta suburbs and 10 at Philips Arena in the city center.
